issue.title: Is it feasible to bypass ROS entirely and use Ignition Transport API directly instead?

content.raw: At this time there is no plan to expose Ignition API for use in CloudSim.  The current ROS interface is well documented on the SubT wiki and has been rigorously tested through the prior two circuits.  Adding a new interface at this point would require documentation and rigorous testing to guarantee functionality and mitigate concerns around competition integrity.
content.html: At this time there is no plan to expose Ignition API for use in CloudSim. The current ROS interface is well documented on the SubT wiki and has been rigorously tested through the prior two circuits. Adding a new interface at this point would require documentation and rigorous testing to guarantee functionality and mitigate concerns around competition integrity.
